column5: This idea has been running through my mind for a while, condering fuel cost, noise from the prop while trolling etc. Ive searched on line and havent found anything yet, and still searching. To convert it to an electric start isnt a big deal, im sure the flywheel has a ring gear, and to find a starter and space for it. My main concern is throttle control. Is there a conversion kit available? Has anyone done this before? I know it may be a task, but why not try, if its feasable. Thanks in advance for your input V
Heres a pic for you guys of my kicker
http://www.marinetechproducts.com/pages/TrollMasterHome/  this is the best system out there Vince  you can't beat it
100% what I was going to say.
Thanks guys, i may have to call them directly. Either way its a thought that I may persue in the future I only use it for emergencies
